name: Kereon AG
goal:
Kereon AG is an independent company with over 15 years of experience, and mainly dedicated to support its customers to achieve efficiently GxP regulatory compliance, in particular e-Compliance (see also computerised system validation).
Kereon AG's customers cover small and mid-size regulated companies, global acting pharmaceutical companies, as well as equipment suppliers and service providers of the pharmaceutical industry.
interests: Digital economy and society, Public Health
euInitiatives: Submitting comments on the draft version of EudraLex documents and related European Directives.
